message.body: There are people barbecuing at my studio tomorrow would you like to come
I would love to! Thank you for inviting me

Yay. Ok so I'm going over in the morning to work and it's like very casual beer and bbqing. I also invited Jeremy too. Have you guys met. He had red dreds? He's really nice. Dont worry not a set up just I think both you guys are great friends. I'm thinking around 4ish but you are welcome anytime
I think I might even take the bus tomorrow now that I have An iphone
You should bring work and come early and then we can hang out on the water with all the people
Haha that all sounds great, I gotta take it slow since it's my first (!!) time out of the house in like a week, god help me
Feel like I've been sick forever and have no life and subsequently, am a loser
Maybe we can get coffee early
I miss you! And I too gave no life which is why on this most social of days tomorrow I am going to be at my studio socializing with the people I say hi to on the pier
Hahaha aww I miss you!!! A lot. I can't wait to hang
Also I am still so excited for our trip. So so excited
